sec.p:
We have used a 10-member POGA pacemaker simulation performed with the US National Center for Atmospheric Research (NCAR) Community Earth System Model version 1 (CESM1) for Fig. 3b–d. Details are found in ref.
29 . We have additionally examined another 10-member tropical Pacific pacemaker simulation by GFDL Coupled Model version 2.1 (CM2.1)
13 . For each of the experiments, ensemble-mean anomalies are regressed onto the ENSO index. The data have been linearly detrended beforehand for consistency with other analyses.
